title: Orchestral Adventure Music Pack
description: 10 colorful and dynamic, orchestral oriented tracks. 60 files.
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


Orchestral Adventure Music Pack is a colorful and dynamic, orchestral oriented, music pack. It was written with adventure and RPG games in mind; intended to provide music to menu screens, over world, zones/levels, in-game battles and cinematics.


The instrumentation includes string section, woodwind section, brass section, choir, harp, piano, marimba, vibraphone, orchestral percussion and cinematic percussion.


It includes 10 tracks, with five additional edits per track, for a total of 60 music files.

The additional edits include a loop version, 2 bumpers that might be useful as transition or musical sfx, an ending edit and a short loop for short duration screens.

All the music files are .wav 44.1kHz, 16 bits.


Track list:


A Resting Place (02:12)

Confronting Evil (01:32)

Dangerous Adventure (02:06)

Dark New World (02:04)

Exciting Mysteries (02:09)

Halls Of Resurrection (02:47)

Start Of A Journey (02:08)

Strange Culture (02:07)

Trouble Ahead (02:08)

Unveiling The Past (02:22)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 High quality orchestral music pieces.
  •  Five additional edits for each track

Number of Audio Wavs: 60

Number of Audio Cues: 60

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 47:22 (including all edits)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
